this is quite a bad rip, even though it is BR, its like it was ripped small and stretched then used grainy sort of blur to smooth it out but failed and its annoyin watching it after experiencing all the sharp movies from PT or other uploader, lifechanger not known for such a bad rip though so it might just be a one off

HD video is over-sharpened, over-contrasted/saturated, and EXTREMELY over-compressed (low bitrate, no definition, blocky). AAC 5.1 audio is butchered (no high frequencies) due to bitrate/size as well. Worse than typical SecretMyth quality, probably due to tremendous 3+ HR film length...
Yes, its extremely OVER SHARPENED. Doesn't look very nice in some scenes.

I ignored the comments and wish I didn't... this movie is not like other punctual SecretMyth's movies... please find another option, it's artifacted, over compressed, you can see dots in everyone's faces until they go dissapearing with time just to appear again when the shoot changes... Bad, bad, bd... I had to erase it and it took days to download for me. Not seeding this. I appreciate the intention a lot (there are not too many extended HD rips from this film) but I have to warn everybody about this.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5175555/King_Kong_2005_Extended_Cut_BRRip_H264_AAC_5_1ch_Gopo#filelistContainer
